definition: Hekou Yaozu autonomous county in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture 紅河哈尼族彞族自治州|红河哈尼族彝族自治州[Hong2 he2 Ha1 ni2 zu2 Yi2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
pinyin: He2 kou3 Yao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Yao ethnic group of southwest China and southeast Asia/surname Yao
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
